import React from 'react' import "./Home.css" import {useSelector} from "react-redux" import { useFormik } from 'formik'; import { loginValidationSchema } from '../../validate.js/validate'; import axios from 'axios'; const cardData={title:"",desc:""}; const Home = () => { const data=useSelector((state)=>{ console.log(state) }) const{values,errors,handleChange,handleSubmit}=useFormik({ initialValues:cardData, validationSchema:loginValidationSchema, onSubmit:async(values,errors)=>{ await axios.post(`http://localhost:5000/user/addpost/$}`) } }) return ( <>
